# AnimatableData

**Protocol**

A functionality specification that animatable data types adopt.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol AnimatableData
```

## Overview

The templated animation objects, for example [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/BlendTreeAnimation] `<Value>`, determine that the type you specify for `Value` adopts this protocol. The types that the framework accepts are: [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/JointTransforms], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Transform], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Float], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/Double], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD2], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD3], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/SIMD4], and [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/simd/simd_quatf].

## Compliance-related protocols

- **BindableData**: An opaque base protocol for bindable data objects.

## Conforming Types

- BlendShapeWeights
- JointTransforms
- Transform
